meanings.definition: A specialized unit of the Russian military.
meanings.sent1: The spets were highly trained soldiers.
meanings.sent2: The spets were called in for top-secret missions.
meanings.sent3: The spets decided to have a surprise party for their commander.
meanings.sent4: The spets were the elite force, like shadows in the night.
meanings.sent5: The spets wore camouflage to blend into their surroundings.

meanings.definition: A type of dog breed known for its hunting abilities.
meanings.sent1: The spets were excellent at tracking scents.
meanings.sent2: The spets were loyal companions on hunting trips.
meanings.sent3: The spets chased their tails in circles, amusing everyone.
meanings.sent4: The spets were like skilled detectives sniffing out clues.
meanings.sent5: The spets had a keen sense of smell that led them to their prey.

meanings.definition: A type of fabric with a raised pattern.
meanings.sent1: The spets fabric felt soft to the touch.
meanings.sent2: The spets fabric added texture to the design.
meanings.sent3: The spets fabric looked like tiny hills on a map.
meanings.sent4: The spets fabric was like a gentle wave frozen in time.
meanings.sent5: The spets fabric created a 3D effect on the clothing.

meanings.sent1: The spets knife had a sharp blade.
meanings.sent2: The spets knife was a versatile tool in combat.
meanings.sent3: The spets knife accidentally cut through a cake at the party.
meanings.sent4: The spets knife gleamed in the sunlight like a beacon.
meanings.sent5: The spets knife was engraved with intricate designs for stealth missions.
